resources.string: Claimed Knight\'s facts are fake news (+1)
Made a negative comment about Knight\'s mother (+2)
Led Knight down dark, twisty logic path, Knight contradicts himeself (+3)
Made a valid point, stunning Troll for a moment (+1)
Delivered snappy comeback to Troll\'s personal attack (+2)
Ignored Troll and checked for Reddit upvotes instead (+3)
Cyber Knight has slain the Internet Troll
Internet Troll has crushed the Cyber Knight
After a long fought battle, both sides retreat
Use the buttons above to keep score in your favorite epic Internet Flame Wars
